task.title: Creating a Sponsor Package
task.abstract: The Sponsors object tracks the organizations purchasing a Sponsor Package, as well as the benefits and levels of sponsorship available for an event. Package items will often include a discount rather than the premium price applied for individual registration.

ul.li: Enable Sponsor Sales on the Event record.

step.cmd: Navigate to the related Event record and click the New Sponsor Package button on the Sponsor Packages related list.
Enter the values for the Sponsor Package Name and Price fields.
Add the Image URL for an image to appear in the Community Portal and the backend Shopping Cart.
Select the Is Active checkbox. Click the Save button.

taskbody.result: An Item record and default price rule are generated for the newly created Sponsor Package. The Item record will similarly be marked as Active, so that it is available for purchase in the Shopping Cart and the Community Portal.
